backend/main.mo: Defines actor with access control, user profiles, topics, subtopics, intervals, and schedule logic for spaced repetition with CRUD and permission checks.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records linking requested UI enhancements to specific frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries of all major frontend files, describing their purpose and behaviors.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication, theme, profile setup, layout, and routing to Dashboard.
frontend/src/components/CalendarView.tsx: Monthly calendar component computing planned study and revision events, due statuses, and rendering date cells.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer showing attribution and caffeine.ai link with simple styling.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with branding, theme toggle, and login/logout logic integrated with Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting new users to enter their name and save their user profile.
frontend/src/components/SettingsView.tsx: Provides a UI for viewing and editing user SRS interval settings and preferred review days, syncing with backend defaults and saved settings.
frontend/src/components/SubTopicSchedule: Displays a subtopicâ€™s study date, planned revision dates, and progress status inside a dialog, using computed scheduling metadata.
frontend/src/components/TodayView.tsx: Shows due and overdue subtopic reviews for a selected date and allows marking reviews as completed.
Displays details of a main topic and lists its subtopics, allowing users to open individual subtopic schedules.
frontend/src/components/TopicDialog.tsx: Modal dialog for creating or editing main topics and subtopics, including titles, descriptions, difficulty, and study dates.
frontend/src/components/TopicsView.tsx: Renders the hierarchical topics list with editing, deletion, detail viewing, scheduling, and completion toggling for main and subtopics.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, login state, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, topics, subtopics, schedules, and related backend data through the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines CSS variables for light and dark theme color tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Implements the main tabbed dashboard containing Today, Topics, Calendar, and Settings views.
frontend/src/utils/reviewStatus.ts: Provides utilities to compute due reviews and planned study/revision items for specific dates.
frontend/src/utils/time.ts: Utilities for converting ICP bigint timestamps to Dates, generating day boundaries, comparing dates for overdue/today checks, and producing stable date keys.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading URL parameters (including hash routes), persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, animations, container settings, and loading typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing the study-scheduling app, known dashboard/calendar issues, and existing feature requirements.
